name: Frame Buffer Offering
description:
I created Frame Buffer Offering for Global Game Jam 2020. It’s a short, experimental puzzle game that uses video feedback loops as the main interaction.

Players manipulate the video feedback effects to guide particles home. Sliders at the bottom of the screen affect the feedback parameters. None of the effects are clear; experimentation and accidental video art are part of the process!

This project was made in openFrameworks and uses the Video_Waaaves engine by Andrei Jay to create the feedback.
